content: *this cuddly holiday teddy will be a great christmas present to any child lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 70704ad corrections applied feb 17 2009 skill level easy jiffy® article #450 3 colors 1 ball each *shown in white chili apple green* crochet hook - size h-8 5 mm split ring stitch markers polyester fiberfill 2 black doll eyes 12 mm small amount of black yarn some construction required to finish bear is worked in continuous rounds scarf is worked separately in row with pom-poms attached
